message.body: Chooch just bunted. CHOOCH JUST BUNTED!!!
You've got to find a replay. It's the most beautiful play you'll see all year.
He does do that sometimes. Ha ha
Suicide squeeze. Took everyone by surprise, especially the Cubs first baseman.
Now we just have to get Ryan Howard to bunt to third!
I know, right? But the wonders continue here at the ballpark â€” Ashe just hit one out!
